description:
Lightweight pogies that will keep your digits from chilling out and your controls comfortably within reach. When riding headlong in to icy winter winds, the Draugenklaw Pogies keep your hands warm and let you brake and shift like you would without the pogies. By simply slipping over your grips and controls, and securing your to your bike with lock-on bar end plugs, these pogies become part of your cockpit in winter months. Whether you’re heading out for a sub-zero training ride or you’re just a dedicated commuter, these pogies protect your hands from less than stellar weather.

  • Softshell material blocks wind and light rain
  • Soft fleecy interior traps warmth and wicks away moisture
  • 45NRTH recommends these pogies for temperatures between 2 and -9°C
  • Lock-on end caps let you secure your pogies to your bike, making them easy to get in and out of. Note, these are designed to work with grips that use end caps/bar plugs, not one piece grips with an enclosed end
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
name: 45NRTH Draugenklaw Pogies - Unisex
